Mumbaikars have heard about the famous paradise restaurant... Hence decided to try out this one with great hope.
Ambience at this place is great; however i was not really impressed with the food and service. 
We ordered :
Chilli chicken : 2.5/ 5 
Paneer tikka : 3.5/5
Chicken masala : 0.1/5 ... lowest rating possible
Chicken biryani: 3/5
Garlic naan: 2/5 
The staff were least bothered and  kept us waiting for like 20 mins jus to take order and after all that the food was very disappointing.  This is only a much hyped restaurant. I would not go and recommend this place to anyone for frequent dine experience.
Ordered Mutton Haleem. It was awesome! Taste of it has been really exceptional while comparing with the big names as pista house & shah ghouse. Definitely try, if you are found of Haleem.

Biryani is the first thing that came to my mind when I landed in Hyderabad. Paradise being one of the most famous places in the city, serves the layered Hyderabadi biryani, the aromatic saffron  flavored rice which is the star of the dish.  It was delicious. 
I also had the Qubani ka meetha which is an Indian sweet made from dried apricots originated in the city, It was perfect with just the right amount of sweetness. 
It will definitely be my go to place the next time I m there!

Fish kebab tikka has 6 small pieces for 289 INR..Not at all worth and arrogant staff because of restaurant’s fame...Delivery person called me saying Restaurant guys asked him to wait for mutton biryani ka saalan...So disguisting service from paradise..
Very kind and courteous staff. The food is so delicious and not too spicy. The dishes are worth for the money. Perfect place if you want to have a grand lunch.

I heard a lot about  this restaurant for Biryani . But i don't like the taste as i expected. I ate much better Biryani on other places.Though i really enjoyed veg curry i.e. Malai Kofta. I never ate such tasty malai kofta ever. 
Service was good and friendly staff.I visited this restaurant many times for north Indian food :)

I heard about these restaurant many times finally got a chance to visit their Gachibowli outlet,when i entered to restaurant i was really excited but when I tested foods it was bit of disappointment cz taste was not up to the Mark and quality wise not as good...but I like their ambience....Staffs are good,polite in nature.....but apart from these I think they should improve their food quality...

'If you are a biriyani lover and in Hyderabad then you must visit this place', this was a saying that I had heard all throughout my life.
I must say I was seriously disappointed with the place.I have had better Biriyani in my life and that too at places which do not get so much of limelight
Delicious food. Service is very good worth of money . A place to visit in Hyderabad . As the name suggest it a paradise for biryani. Must visit place
Had a good experience with the taste of chicken biriyani and the desert was awsome and nice service..stuff behavior was polite ..will come again soon..
Very good service... I loved this place.. Neat environment. Good serving staff. Food was tasty as expected. Finally yum food as we want. You can visit this place.

We tried paradise for the first time and the food was great, freshly cooked very tasty and well presented. The waiters were attentive and service overall was good. Overall a good meal and great value we will certainly be going back.

Nice ambience,food so so..
